sentence: Instead, Trump has endorsed former Sen. David Purdue, who lost his Senate seat in January to Democrat Jon Ossoff due at least in part to Trump's relentless quest to delegitimize election results.
author: David Faris
title: 5 midterm races to watch in 2022
